summary: The diff evidence is insufficient to confirm that the required downloadable CSV/XLSX template assets and corresponding Import Lists UI download controls/copy were implemented. The only clearly evidenced changes are global styling/theme updates, which are outside the stated requirements for this build request.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add downloadable sample/template files (CSV in static/public assets and an XLSX template with sheets named "Parties"/"Items") and expose them via visible download control(s) in the Import Lists card, with no backend calls.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary reports no added files (Added: 0) and does not show any public/static asset files (e.g., sample CSV/XLSX) being added. The provided App.tsx snippet is truncated before any download controls can be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update Import Lists UI copy to briefly mention availability of sample template downloads and keep existing CSV/XLSX instructions accurate.
missing_requirements.reason: App.tsx is truncated and the shown portion contains no verifiable UI copy about template downloads or updated instructions; no other UI files in the diff provide this copy.

hallucinated_features.description: Global visual theme / palette overhaul (OKLCH color system, purple-tinted palette, typography and shadow token changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request is focused on adding downloadable import templates and small Import Lists copy updates; it does not request broad styling/theme changes.
